scripts.digestr:fast: bash -lc 'ROOT=$(pwd); cd workflow-tools/proj_digestr && MAX_LINES=800 HEAD_TAKE=300 TAIL_TAKE=300 ./main.sh -o "$ROOT/PROJECT_BUNDLE.md" -X "**/dist,**/.turbo,**/.cache,**/node_modules/**"'
scripts.digestr:full: bash -lc 'ROOT=$(pwd); cd workflow-tools/proj_digestr && MAX_LINES=2000 HEAD_TAKE=700 TAIL_TAKE=700 ./main.sh -o "$ROOT/PROJECT_BUNDLE.md"'
scripts.digestr:tree:
bash --noprofile --norc -lc 'ROOT=$(pwd); npm run -s digestr && printf "
# Repo Tree

" >> "$ROOT/PROJECT_BUNDLE.md" && printf '''```text
''' >> "$ROOT/PROJECT_BUNDLE.md" && tree -L 3 -a --dirsfirst >> "$ROOT/PROJECT_BUNDLE.md" && printf '''
```
''' >> "$ROOT/PROJECT_BUNDLE.md"'
scripts.digestr:check: bash -lc 'B=$(stat -c %Y PROJECT_BUNDLE.md 2>/dev/null || echo 0); C=$(git log -1 --format=%ct 2>/dev/null || echo 0); if [ "$B" -lt "$C" ]; then echo "STALE: bundle older than latest commit"; exit 1; else echo "FRESH: bundle is up-to-date vs latest commit"; fi'
scripts.backup:restore:latest: LATEST=$(ls -1t $HOME/backups/warboy/warboy-*.tar.gz | head -1) && DEST=$HOME/Desktop/warboy-restore-latest && mkdir -p "$DEST" && tar -xzf "$LATEST" -C "$DEST" && echo Restored to: "$DEST/$(basename "$LATEST" .tar.gz)"
scripts.gitready:commit: bash --noprofile --norc workflow-tools/git/gitready.sh --message "chore: repo hygiene (README, bundler, backups)"
